summary: A documentary about a man who impersonates a wise Indian Guru and builds a following in Arizona. At the height of his popularity, the Guru Kumaré must reveal his true identity to his disciples and unveil his greatest teaching of all.
cast: Vikram Gandhi|Toby|Greg|Molly|Kimberley|Stewart|Joyce|Sue|Rachel|Bobby|Teresa|Riad|Rachel|Donna|Andre|Tish|Monica|Angel Marie|Pam|Darrell|Life|Gabriel of Urantia|Farmer John|John|Robert|Purva Bedi|Kristen Calgaro|Swami Chinnanda|Bhagavan Das|Amrit Desai|Emily|Nian|Baba Ragu Ram|John Rogers|Vaneet
keywords: overhead camera shot|cell phone|cutting one's hair|guru|disciple
title: Kumaré
